name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 057
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, For A Vaccine, USA Needs Boosters. As the Biden administration gears up to provide boosters to all Americans who want one the WHO’s director has called it out as “a mockery of vaccine equity.” The Biden administration’s decision arises from the growing number of cases due to the delta strain along with CDC research that found people who received the mRNA vaccines were becoming less able to prevent COVID-19 infection, however infection does not equate to hospitalization and there are many countries where one dose of ANY vaccine hasn’t even been available. The US should be leading the global charge towards providing safe and reliable vaccines to everyone before diverting valuable vaccine resources to the already protected.
